pyconversations.ld
==================

.. testsetup::

    from pyconversations.ld import *

`pyconversation.ld` is the language detection sub-module of the PyConversation package.
Many portions of PyConversation allow for the enabling of language detection,
which currently uses the langid package.

Want to see other language detection support? Submit a feature request or feel free to contribute!

.. automodule:: pyconversations.ld
    :members:
